easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I help you tell time every day. What am I?
easy.hint: I point and move to show minutes or hours.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think about a small number and a common word for multiple letters.

hard.q: A box contains red and blue marbles. Without looking, you pick one marble, and the color you choose decides the next move: red means go left, blue means go right. If you want to end up at a specific square, which marble should you aim to pick first and why?
hard.a: The marble that leads to the desired path; plan the route knowing red/blue moves
hard.hint: Think about planning a sequence of choices and how the color directs the next step.
